alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 10:04AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, eastern Gadsden, northwestern Jefferson, Leon, southeastern Decatur, Grady and western Thomas Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 1004 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Whigham to Crawfordville. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Havana, Bainbridge, Midway, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Cairo, Whigham, Doak Campbell Stadium, West Bainbridge, Wakulla, Attapulgus, Climax, Lake Bradford, Cody, Capel and Wakulla Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
